spatial_accuracy.notes: General layout is preserved, but there are significant door and window inconsistencies. The main entrance door swings the wrong way, and many windows have been transformed into floor-to-ceiling glass openings. The internal bathroom door is missing its wall segment.

structural_fidelity.notes: Major violation: text labels 'Bedroom' and 'Kitchen/Living' were hallucinated into the 3D geometry from the 2D source. Some walls are floating or disconnected near the bathroom area.

furniture_mapping.notes: Furniture placement is mostly accurate to the plan, including the kitchen island, sofa, and dining set. Minor scale issues with the hallway chair.

aesthetic_quality.notes: Excellent adherence to low-poly, flat-shaded aesthetic. Soft ambient lighting and isometric camera angle are correct. Neutral background is well-executed.

detected_errors.description: Text labels 'Kitchen/Living' and 'Bedroom' are erroneously modeled into the 3D floor.
Main entrance door flip; window proportions changed to floor-level voids.
Hallucinated extra armchair in the hallway space near the bedroom entrance.
Missing specific wall partition between the bathroom and the small closet area.
